Who we are
We deliver events, experiences & ideas that connect brands to people.
We are a premier event management, food and beverage concessionaire and production agency, executing over 100 events annually and attracting over 2 million attendees each year. At the core of our success is a commitment to innovation, consistently redefining industry standards with groundbreaking solutions that expand the possibilities of event experiences.
Our expertise speaks for itself: we have partnered with numerous international brands, festivals, and corporations to manage events, conferences, and conceptual activations across the nation. For two consecutive years, we have ranked among the top 100 on INC 5000’s.
Our Approach
LOGISTICS, EXPERIENCE & DETAILS ALL COMBINED. We Walk the Walk and Talk the Talk. We have built SWARM to be a turnkey solution.
Planning and producing your event is a complex set of tasks. SWARM’s experience running hundreds of events per year helps event producers and owners achieve the event’s goals.
We have worked with agencies and direct clients to bring their event concepts to fruition.
Budgeting

Décor
What We Build
100+ events per year,with over 2 million event-goers. Produce, manage, operate, liberate, and execute. Full-circle event agency.
Crafting Experiential LIVE Events with purpose, securing every activation and event is designed to engage and connect audiences with brands on a deeper level. From Site Operations and expert Event Management to tailored Brand Event Marketing Strategies, we deliver experiences that not only captivate but also align with brand goals. Every event we plan is backed by thoughtful strategy and execution, bringing brands to life.
CONTACT US
CAREERS
Brickell Top 20
Brickell Top 20
TOP 20 PROFESSIONALS UNDER FORTY 2022
Sarah Porter, 36 - Vice President
SWARM, Inc. • SWARMInc.com
SWARM is South Florida’s Largest 360 live event agency servicing over 100 festivals per year from conceptualizing and strategizing through operation and execution. “I always say we’re in the best industry in the world because we get to be dreamers,” says SWARM VP Sarah Porter. “We produce experiences that people had no idea they even wanted because it never existed before we created it!”
